text: Marie von Olfers (27 October 1826, Berlin – 8 January 1924, Berlin) was a German writer, illustrator and salonnière. She wrote under the pseudonym M(aria) Werner, Werner Maria. She was also a major artistic influence on her niece Sibylle von Olfers. == Life== She was the second daughter of the museum director Ignaz von Olfers and the writer Hedwig, née von Staegemann. == Works == * Drei Märchen. Zum Besten einer armen Waise (1862) * Herr Mops. Ein Mährchen (1863) * Frau Evchen. Eine sehr alltägliche Historie (1865) * Novellen (1872) * Eigenthum (Novelle, in: Deutsche Rundschau, 1. Jg.
